bin/btsp.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Bottleneck TSP heuristic.
00003  *
00004  * Runs the Bottleneck TSP heuristic on the given input file.  
00005  *
00006  * @author  John LaRusic
00007  * @ingroup bin
00008  ****************************************************************************/
00009 #include "common.h"
00010 #include "lb.h"
00011 #include "tsp.h"
00012 #include "btsp.h"
00013 
00014 /* Global variables */
00015 char *input_file = NULL;
00016 char *xml_file = NULL;
00017 int edge_infinity = -1;
00018 int random_restarts = -1;
00019 int stall_count = -1;
00020 int kicks = -1;
00021 int confirm_sol = ARROW_FALSE;
00022 int supress_ebst = ARROW_FALSE;
00023 int find_short_tour = ARROW_FALSE;
00024 int supress_hash = ARROW_FALSE;
00025 int deep_copy = ARROW_FALSE;
00026 int lower_bound = -1;
00027 int upper_bound = INT_MAX;
00028 int basic_attempts = 3;
00029 int shake_1_attempts = 1;
00030 int shake_1_rand_min = 0;
00031 int shake_1_rand_max = -1;
00032 int random_seed = 0;
00033 
00034 /* Program options */
00035 #define NUM_OPTS 17
00036 arrow_option options[NUM_OPTS] = 
00037 {
00038     {'i', "input", "TSPLIB input file", 
00039         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &input_file, ARROW_TRUE, ARROW_TRUE},
00040     {'x', "xml", "file to write XML output to",
00041         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &xml_file, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00042         
00043     {'r', "restarts", "number of random restarts",
00044         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &random_restarts, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00045     {'s', "stall-count", "max number of 4-swaps w/o progress",
00046         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &stall_count, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00047     {'k', "kicks", "number of 4-swap kicks",
00048         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &kicks, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00049     {'c', "confirm-solution", "confirm solution with exact solver",
00050         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &confirm_sol, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00051     {'e', "supress-ebst", "supress binary search",
00052         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &supress_ebst, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00053     {'S', "find-short-tour", "finds a (relatively) short BTSP tour",
00054         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &find_short_tour, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00055     {'H', "supress-hash", "do not create hash table",
00056         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &supress_hash, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00057     {'d', "deep-copy", "stores data in full cost-matrix",
00058         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &deep_copy, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00059         
00060     {'l', "lower-bound", "initial lower bound",
00061         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &lower_bound, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00062     {'u', "upper-bound", "initial upper bound",
00063         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &upper_bound, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00064     {'a', "basic-attempts", "number of basic attempts",
00065         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &basic_attempts, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00066         
00067     {'b', "shake-1-attempts", "number of shake type I attempts",
00068         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &shake_1_attempts, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00069     {'1', "shake-1-rand-min", "min value for shake type I random numbers",
00070         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &shake_1_rand_min, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00071     {'2', "shake-1-rand-max", "max value for shake type I random numbers",
00072         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &shake_1_rand_max, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00073         
00074     {'g', "random-seed", "random number generator seed",
00075         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &random_seed, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE}
00076 };
00077 char *desc = "Bottleneck traveling salesman problem (BTSP) solver";
00078 char *usage = "-i tsplib.tsp [options]";
00079 
00080 /* Main method */
00081 int 
00082 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00083 {   
00084     int ret = EXIT_SUCCESS;
00085 
00086     arrow_problem problem;
00087     arrow_problem_info info;
00088     arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params lk_params;
00089     arrow_btsp_fun fun_basic;
00090     arrow_btsp_fun fun_shake_1;
00091     arrow_btsp_result result;
00092     arrow_btsp_params btsp_params;
00093     
00094     double start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00095     double end_time;
00096     double bbssp_time = -1.0;
00097     
00098     /* Read program arguments */
00099     if(!arrow_options_parse(NUM_OPTS, options, desc, usage, argc, argv, NULL))
00100         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00101         
00102     /* Try and read the problem file */
00103     if(!arrow_problem_read(input_file, &problem))
00104         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00105     if(!problem.symmetric)
00106     {
00107         arrow_print_error("Solver only works on symmetric matrices.");
00108         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00109     }
00110     
00111     /* Gather basic info about the problem */
00112     if(!arrow_problem_info_get(&problem, !supress_hash, &info))
00113         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00114     printf("Number of unique costs: %d\n", info.cost_list_length);
00115     
00116     /* Extra processing for arguments */
00117     if(shake_1_rand_max < 0) 
00118         shake_1_rand_max = (problem.size * problem.size) + shake_1_rand_min;
00119     if(shake_1_rand_max - shake_1_rand_min < info.cost_list_length)
00120     {
00121         arrow_print_error("shake random interval not large enough");
00122         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00123     }
00124     
00125     /* Calculate a value for infinity if necessary */
00126     if(edge_infinity < 0)
00127     {
00128         edge_infinity = (info.max_cost + shake_1_rand_max) * 2;
00129         printf("infinity: %d\n", edge_infinity);
00130     }
00131     
00132     /* Initialize random number generator */
00133     arrow_util_random_seed(random_seed);
00134 
00135     /* Determine if we need to call the BBSSP to find a lower bound */
00136     if(lower_bound < 0)
00137     {
00138         printf("Solving BBSSP to find a lower bound\n");
00139         arrow_bound_result bbssp_result;
00140         if(!arrow_bbssp_solve(&problem, &info, &bbssp_result))
00141         {
00142             arrow_print_error("Could not solve BBSSP on file.\n");
00143             arrow_problem_destruct(&problem);
00144             return EXIT_FAILURE;
00145         }
00146         lower_bound = bbssp_result.obj_value;
00147         bbssp_time = bbssp_result.total_time;
00148         printf("BBSSP lower bound is %d\n.", lower_bound);
00149     }
00150     
00151     /* Setup LK parameters structure */
00152     arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_init(&problem, &lk_params);
00153     if(random_restarts >= 0)    lk_params.random_restarts  = random_restarts;
00154     if(stall_count >= 0)        lk_params.stall_count      = stall_count;
00155     if(kicks >= 0)              lk_params.kicks            = kicks;
00156         
00157     /* Setup necessary function structures */
00158     if(arrow_btsp_fun_basic(ARROW_FALSE, &fun_basic) != ARROW_SUCCESS)
00159         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00160     if(!arrow_btsp_fun_sbtsp_shake_1(deep_copy, edge_infinity, shake_1_rand_min,
00161                                      shake_1_rand_max, &info, &fun_shake_1))
00162         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00163         
00164     #define SOLVE_STEPS 2
00165     arrow_btsp_solve_plan steps[SOLVE_STEPS] = 
00166     {
00167        {
00168            ARROW_TSP_CC_LK,                 /* TSP solver */
00169            (void *)&lk_params,              /* TSP solver parameters */
00170            fun_basic,                       /* fun (cost matrix function) */
00171            basic_attempts                   /* attempts */
00172        },
00173        {
00174            ARROW_TSP_CC_LK,                 /* TSP solver */
00175            (void *)&lk_params,              /* TSP solver parameters */
00176            fun_shake_1,                     /* fun (cost matrix function) */
00177            shake_1_attempts                 /* attempts */
00178        }
00179     };
00180     arrow_btsp_solve_plan confirm_plan = 
00181     {
00182        ARROW_TSP_CC_EXACT,
00183        NULL,
00184        fun_basic,
00185        1
00186     };
00187         
00188     /* Setup BTSP parameters structure */
00189     arrow_btsp_params_init(&btsp_params);
00190     btsp_params.confirm_sol         = confirm_sol;
00191     btsp_params.supress_ebst        = supress_ebst;
00192     btsp_params.find_short_tour     = find_short_tour;
00193     btsp_params.lower_bound         = lower_bound;
00194     btsp_params.upper_bound         = upper_bound;
00195     btsp_params.num_steps           = SOLVE_STEPS;
00196     btsp_params.steps               = steps;
00197     btsp_params.confirm_plan        = confirm_plan;
00198     
00199     /* Setup BTSP results structure */
00200     arrow_btsp_result_init(&problem, &result);
00201     if(!arrow_btsp_solve(&problem, &info, &btsp_params, &result))
00202     {
00203         arrow_print_error("Could not solve BTSP on file.\n");
00204         ret = EXIT_FAILURE;
00205         goto CLEANUP;
00206     }
00207     end_time = arrow_util_zeit() - start_time;
00208     
00209     /* Final output */
00210     arrow_btsp_result_print_pretty(&result, stdout);
00211     printf("Initial Lower Bound: %d\n", lower_bound);
00212     if(bbssp_time >= 0.0)
00213         printf("BBSSP Time: %.2f\n", bbssp_time);
00214     printf("Total Time: %.2f\n", end_time);
00215         
00216     /* Xml output */
00217     if(xml_file != NULL)
00218     {
00219         FILE *xml;
00220         if(!(xml = fopen(xml_file, "w")))
00221         {
00222             arrow_print_error("Could not open xml file for writing");
00223             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00224             goto CLEANUP;
00225         }
00226         
00227         fprintf(xml, "<arrow_btsp problem_file=\"%s\"", input_file);
00228         fprintf(xml, " command_args=\"");
00229         arrow_util_print_program_args(argc, argv, xml);
00230         fprintf(xml, "\">\n");
00231 
00232         arrow_btsp_result_print_xml(&result, xml);
00233         
00234         fprintf(xml, "    <total_time>%.2f</total_time>\n", end_time);
00235         fprintf(xml, "</arrow_btsp>\n");
00236         
00237         fclose(xml);
00238     }
00239     
00240 CLEANUP:
00241     arrow_btsp_result_destruct(&result);
00242     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_basic);
00243     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_shake_1);
00244     arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_destruct(&lk_params); 
00245     arrow_problem_destruct(&problem);
00246     return ret;
00247 }
